fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives: Bank of Valletta being a specialist in the implementation of EU funded guarantee financial instruments follows EU initiatives related to SME finance, the Multiannual Financial Framework and European Structural and investment funds.  The Representative Office also follows Banking Union files related specifically to CRR and BRRD.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: BOV EU Representative Office 11, Rue Marie-Therese
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Support to Circular Economy Financing Expert Group#E03517#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3517#Member#C
membership: Corporate Members of trade association and networks, such as the European Savings Banks Group (ESBG), the European Long Term Investors (ELTI) Association and the Malta Bankers Association (MBA).
goals__remit: Bank of Valletta Group is a leading Malta based financial servcies group providing a wide range of banking and financial services to personal and corporate clients.  Our business activities include the entire range of retail banking services as well as the sale of financial products, such as units in collective investment schemes. The Bank also offers investment banking services, including underwriting, management of Initial Public Offerings and custodianship.
relevant_communication: Public relations is limited to meetings with EU officials (specifically EU Commission and European Investment Bank), articles in national and online media and TV interviews.
